channel.title: Compiler- System cannot find the path specified. HELP! please
channel.description: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2z6gz89.png[/img] ive redownloaded many times please help!! My run wont work heres the code: [code]@echo off cd Bin java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]

item.title: Compiler- System cannot find the path specified. HELP! please
item.dc:creator: @weed4u weed4u
item.description:
@weed4u wrote:

my “run” wont work, as in running the server not the compiler, it says i don’t have java but i do.

Read full topic
item.source: Compiler- System cannot find the path specified. HELP! please

item.title: Compiler- System cannot find the path specified. HELP! please
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You could either set you environmental variables, or go in the batch file and replace

java

With

"C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe"

Read full topic

but my run still dosnt work any help with that?

item.source: Compiler- System cannot find the path specified. HELP! please

item.title: Compiler- System cannot find the path specified. HELP! please
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You change where the batch file is trying to find the file.

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac"

To

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac"

Etc…

Read full topic
item.source: Compiler- System cannot find the path specified. HELP! please

item.title: Compiler- System cannot find the path specified. HELP! please
item.dc:creator: @weed4u weed4u
item.description:
@weed4u wrote:

deathschaos9:

Are you blind? JRE and JDK are both in Program Files (x86). All your batch files are trying to load java from Program Files.

so what do i do because thats the only java fine on my computer and thats where it installed to by defalt.

Read full topic

deathschaos9:

Protip: “C:/Program Files/” is not “C:/Program Files (x86)”

Protip: thats where my java file is…
(might not be for you)
